attributes.action: Change the way Visas are processed
attributes.additional_details: We believe this will raise awareness on this issue and help people gain knowledge on why this is a problem in society.
attributes.background: We want to change the process of the visa and certain aspects such as deportation and visa renewal fees.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  

We understand that you would like changes to immigration policies, but we're not exactly sure what changes you'd like to see. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you'd like to see. 

If you are concerned about visa fees, there are existing petitions available that you could sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641140
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643244

If you are concerned about deportations, there are existing petitions available:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640226
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640382
